title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7821.5 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7821.5 - Penalties

State Regulations

Any person who knowingly fails to submit a compliance
statement as required by section
7821.4
of this Part, or who
knowingly fails to bring an existing building which is privately owned into
compliance with the standards by April 1, 1981, shall be liable for a civil
penalty of up to $1,000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7821.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
